name: Retrotron
description: Retrotron is an oscilloscope-themed robot hailing from the prestigious WebtrES club. With its vibrant orange box and classic screen, this robot stands out among its peers. Sporting soldier-like arms and legs, Retrotron is a formidable presence in any digital realm. Its retroConsole buttons add a nostalgic touch, allowing it to effortlessly navigate through the virtual landscape. Equipped with advanced technology, Retrotron has honed its ability_scores to achieve a perfect balance of hp, charisma, constitution, dexterity, intelligence, strength, and wisdom. This remarkable robot is ready to explore new frontiers and leave a lasting impression on all who encounter it.
